title: KO Cannon
summaries: The KO Cannon is a Hardmode melee weapon which has a 20*1/5 (20%) chance to be dropped by Clown / 0.1*1/1000 (0.1%) chance to be dropped by any enemy during a Hardmode Blood Moon. It autofires a boxing glove projectile that is connected to the weapon's base by a short, thick chain. After striking a target or traveling 17 blocks, the glove retracts back into the weapon before being ready to fire again.
Despite this weapon having a relatively short range, its higher knockback, base damage, and immunity to gravitational arcing makes it very strong at close quarters.
The KO Cannon has no cooldown period; therefore its autofire rate is dependent only on the distance to its impact, meaning that an enemy or object in close range will cause a faster autofire rate.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
